results.content: The course taught me everything I need to know to create a complete WordPress website. The course is short and to the point.

results.content: This is  really Amazing Course. I really like the way of  his teaching style & content also. Highly Recommended

results.content: This course is very well prepared, containing all the steps you need to go through if you want to create a wordpress site from scratch. The way it is explained is extremely professional. Teacher use a very close language avoiding too technical terms in order to make the travel very smooth. I recommend to take this course to anyone who wants to start diving in the amazing world of wordpress. Thanks a lot Mr. Ananda for creating this course keeping in my student's needs.

response.content: Thank you so much for your kind words Mr.Juan.
response.content_html: Thank you so much for your kind words Mr.Juan.
